content:
Probably the definitive 'classic' metal albums.

title: Re: Favorite metal album (2)
content:
What? No Judas Priest, Djaser? Don't you love that band?

Ok I voted for Master of Puppets, but i think Rust in Peace should at least be noted, so there.

title: Re: Favorite metal album (2)
content:
I do, I do... especially Rob Halford but I don't think anyone would have voted on them so that's why their left out. It doesn't matter anyway, all votes seem to go Metallica.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]

Megadeth deserves a honourable mentioning, so here you go.
